lines.text: What is it you want help with? My plane leaves...
No, but I was raised in Danderyd...
Mayday! Mayday! SK-347 calling Stockholm Arlanda. We have an emergency. Request permission to land. Over.
[no response from the air traffic controller]
Mayday! Mayday! SK-347 calling Stockholm Arlanda. We have an emergency. Request to land. Over.
[the air traffic controller opens a bottle of vodka and starts to drink]
Absolut! For men who can set limits!
